Title: Still Crazy After All These Years
Plot: Alan helps his ex-lover who tried to kill him get out of a psychiatric hospital. Brad and Denny take a case where a wife is suing the hospital for causing her emotional distress when her husband died during an angioplasty. Denny learns this new case will help the other partners decide if he is a liability to the firm. Lori tries to steer Sally away from Alan.
GuestStars: John Michael Higgins,  Andy Milder,  Steven Anderson,  Ms. P. Reney,  Thomas Knickerbocker,  Anthony S. Johnson,  David Connell,  Eric Payne,  Frances Fisher,  Erika Greenspan,  Penelope Windust,  Joel Anderson
